item.title: Checking status of specific jail
item.description: root@example:/var/log# fail2ban-client status sshd Status for the jail: sshd |- Filter | |- Currently failed: 6 | |- Total failed: 91801 | `- File list: /var/log/auth.log `- Actions |- Currently banned: 1 |- Total banned: 9971 `- Banned IP list: 51.15.255.133
